mapper.sql: id, house_id, city, region, business_area, estate, address, fangdong_name, fangdong_telephone, fangdong_idcard, shoukuanren_name, shoukuanren_telephone, shoukuanren_kaihuhang, shoukuanren_account, house_type, area, room_area, room_chaoxiang, room_tese, room_yuqichufangjia, contract_no, contract_date, contract_startdate, contract_enddate, contract_month, finish_date, firstyear_monthrent, secondyear_monthrent, thirdyear_monthrent, fourthyear_monthrent, fifthyear_monthrent, sixthyear_monthrent, pay_nextyear, pay_date, name, region_manager, totalcost, paymethod, deposit, overdue_payment, remark, house_provider, provider_money, job_no, room_num, state, district, date
mapper.select: select contract_no,house_id,district,address,shoukuanren_name,shoukuanren_telephone,shoukuanren_kaihuhang,shoukuanren_account,contract_startdate,pay_date, contract_enddate,contract_month,firstyear_monthrent,secondyear_monthrent,thirdyear_monthrent,fourthyear_monthrent,fifthyear_monthrent,sixthyear_monthrent, deposit,remark,paymethod from houselist where district = #{district} and (state = '配置中' or state = '空置中' or state = '已出租')
select job_no,house_id,address,contract_no,region_manager,district,state from houselist where district = #{district} and state = '空置中'
select job_no,house_id,address,contract_no,region_manager,district,state,estate,business_area,house_type from houselist where district = #{district} and state = '配置中'
select COUNT(*) FROM houselist where contract_no = #{contract_no}
select MAX(ls_id) FROM houselist WHERE ls_id < 10000
select * from houselist order by IF(vacancy_date is NULL or vacancy_date="",finish_date,vacancy_date)

select * from houselist
house_id = #{house_id} and
city like CONCAT('%',#{city},'%') and
region like CONCAT('%',#{region},'%') and
estate like CONCAT('%',#{estate},'%') and
business_area like CONCAT('%',#{business_area},'%') and
address like CONCAT('%',#{address},'%') and
fangdong_name like CONCAT('%',#{fangdong_name},'%') and
fangdong_telephone =#{fangdong_telephone} and
fangdong_idcard =#{fangdong_idcard} and
shoukuanren_name like CONCAT('%',#{shoukuanren_name},'%') and
shoukuanren_telephone =#{shoukuanren_telephone} and
shoukuanren_kaihuhang like CONCAT('%',#{shoukuanren_kaihuhang},'%') and
shoukuanren_account =#{shoukuanren_account} and
house_type=#{house_type} and
area =#{area} and
room_area=#{room_area} and
room_chaoxiang =#{room_chaoxiang} and
room_tese like CONCAT('%',#{room_tese},'%') and
room_yuqichufangjia =#{room_yuqichufangjia} and
contract_no like CONCAT('%',#{contract_no},'%') and
contract_date= #{contract_date} and
contract_startdate = #{contract_startdate} and
contract_enddate = #{contract_enddate} and
contract_month = #{contract_month} and
vacancy_date= #{vacancy_date} and
firstyear_monthrent = #{firstyear_monthrent} and
secondyear_monthrent = #{secondyear_monthrent and
thirdyear_monthrent = #{thirdyear_monthrent) and
fourthyear_monthrent like CONCAT('%',#{fourthyear_monthrent},'%') and
fifthyear_monthrent = #{fifthyear_monthrent} and
sixthyear_monthrent= #{sixthyear_monthrent} and
pay_nextyear = #{pay_nextyear} and
pay_date = #{pay_date} and
name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and
region_manager = #{region_manager} and
totalcost= #{totalcost} and
paymethod = #{paymethod} and
deposit =#{deposit} and
overdue_payment like CONCAT('%',#{overdue_payment},'%') and
remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%') and
house_provider like CONCAT('%',#{house_provider},'%') and
provider_money like CONCAT('%',#{provider_money},'%') and
job_no like CONCAT('%',#{job_no},'%') and
room_num like CONCAT('%',#{room_num},'%') and
state like CONCAT('%',#{state},'%') and
district like CONCAT('%',#{district},'%') and
1=1
order by IF(vacancy_date is NULL or vacancy_date="",contract_startdate,vacancy_date) -- order by IF(vacancy_date is NULL or vacancy_date="",finish_date,vacancy_date)
mapper.update:
update houselist
city=#{city},
region=#{region},
estate=#{estate},
business_area=#{business_area},
address=#{address},
fangdong_name=#{fangdong_name},
fangdong_telephone=#{fangdong_telephone},
fangdong_idcard=#{fangdong_idcard},
shoukuanren_name=#{shoukuanren_name},
shoukuanren_telephone=#{shoukuanren_telephone},
shoukuanren_kaihuhang=#{shoukuanren_kaihuhang},
shoukuanren_account=#{shoukuanren_account},
house_type=#{house_type},
area=#{area},
room_area=#{room_area},
room_chaoxiang=#{room_chaoxiang},
room_tese=#{room_tese},
room_yuqichufangjia=#{room_yuqichufangjia},
contract_no=#{contract_no},
contract_date=#{contract_date},
contract_startdate=#{contract_startdate},
contract_enddate=#{contract_enddate},
contract_month=#{contract_month},
finish_date=#{finish_date},
vacancy_date=#{vacancy_date},
firstyear_monthrent=#{firstyear_monthrent},
secondyear_monthrent=#{secondyear_monthrent},
thirdyear_monthrent=#{thirdyear_monthrent},
fourthyear_monthrent=#{fourthyear_monthrent},
fifthyear_monthrent=#{fifthyear_monthrent},
sixthyear_monthrent=#{sixthyear_monthrent},
pay_nextyear=#{pay_nextyear},
pay_date=#{pay_date},
name=#{name},
region_manager=#{region_manager},
totalcost=#{totalcost},
paymethod=#{paymethod},
deposit = #{deposit},
overdue_payment=#{overdue_payment},
remark=#{remark},
house_provider=#{house_provider},
provider_money=#{provider_money},
job_no=#{job_no},
room_num=#{room_num},
state=#{state},
district=#{district}
where house_id=#{house_id}
mapper.insert: insert into houselist( house_id, city, region, estate, business_area, address, fangdong_name, fangdong_telephone, fangdong_idcard, shoukuanren_name, shoukuanren_telephone, shoukuanren_kaihuhang, shoukuanren_account, house_type, area, room_area, room_chaoxiang, room_tese, room_yuqichufangjia, contract_no, contract_date, contract_startdate, contract_enddate, contract_month, firstyear_monthrent, secondyear_monthrent, thirdyear_monthrent, fourthyear_monthrent, fifthyear_monthrent, sixthyear_monthrent, pay_nextyear, pay_date, name, region_manager, totalcost, paymethod, deposit, overdue_payment, remark, house_provider, provider_money, job_no, room_num, state, district, date, ls_id, room_id) SELECT #{house_id}, #{city}, #{region}, #{estate}, #{business_area}, #{address}, #{fangdong_name}, #{fangdong_telephone}, #{fangdong_idcard}, #{shoukuanren_name}, #{shoukuanren_telephone}, #{shoukuanren_kaihuhang}, #{shoukuanren_account}, #{house_type}, #{area}, #{room_area}, #{room_chaoxiang}, #{room_tese}, #{room_yuqichufangjia}, #{contract_no}, #{contract_date}, #{contract_startdate}, #{contract_enddate}, #{contract_month}, #{firstyear_monthrent}, #{secondyear_monthrent}, #{thirdyear_monthrent}, #{fourthyear_monthrent}, #{fifthyear_monthrent}, #{sixthyear_monthrent}, #{pay_nextyear}, #{pay_date}, #{name}, #{region_manager}, #{totalcost}, #{paymethod}, #{deposit}, #{overdue_payment}, #{remark}, #{house_provider}, #{provider_money}, #{job_no}, #{room_num}, #{state}, #{district}, #{date}, #{ls_id}, MAX(houselist.room_id)+1 FROM houselist
